title: Exposing Satan's schemes
abstract:
In this popular series, Pastor Tom Terry reveals through the Word of God 
		and over 30 years of ministry experience how Witchcraft influences us and attacks the church. 
		Exposing Satan's Schemes will show you how the devil deceives you and works against the 
		church through discord and other "schemes." If you have been naive about this subject 
		let this teaching change your life!
